Produce Flame is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Produce Flame is a Cantrip from the Conjuration school. Spells are regulated forms of magic energy that can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflicting Status Effects, buffing Characters, or interacting with the environment.
